title: SLEEP!
text: Get a good night's rest. It's really good for you.

title: Learn to meal prep
text: It's a great way to eat better, save money, and provide good brain fuel.

title: Coffee
text: If it's before noon, be sure to make a new pot of coffee so others won't have to wait.

title: LinkedIn Networking
text: It's expected that you accept every request you get, apparently.
